SEARCH
Module com.marinescu.fxmoney
Package com.marinescu.fxmoney

Class ClientProfile

java.lang.Object
com.marinescu.fxmoney.ClientProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
MyRandomGenerator, MyValidation
public class ClientProfile extends Object implements MyRandomGenerator, MyValidation
This class handles the logic behind the clientProfile.fxml file. It performs operations on a client and account's information.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientProfile

      public ClientProfile()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      This method is automatically called after the clientProfile.fxml file has been loaded. It adds all the client's accounts to the choice box, selects the current account and displays account information. It also shows the list of all account transactions.

    • showClientDetails

      public void showClientDetails()
      It shows a modal window with the client's information.

    • editClientProfile

      public void editClientProfile()
      Shows a modal window with a form for changing the client's profile information.

    • addNewAccount

      public void addNewAccount()
      This method adds a new account, different from the existing one.

    • newTransaction

      public void newTransaction()
      This method shows a modal window, which let the user performing a new transaction.

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw()
      This method withdraws an amount from the account. It shows the withdrawal container to allow the user to enter the withdrawal amount. Checks the validity of the entered data. If entered data is valid, will perform the withdrawal operation and will hide the withdrawal container, otherwise it will display a message.

    • deposit

      public void deposit()
      This method adds an amount to the account It shows the deposit container to allow the user to enter the deposit amount. Checks the validity of the entered data. If entered data is valid, will perform the deposit operation and will hide the deposit container, otherwise it will display a message.

    • loanRequest

      public void loanRequest()
      This method displays a modal window with a loan request form.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      This disconnects the client's account and returns to the search client window.
